markdownRemark.html: The school is located in the heart of Alhaurin el Grande, a village in the Comarca del Guadalhorce located 20 minutes from Malaga airport and the Costa del Sol. They provide Spanish classes for foreigners, which are intensive courses with hours to suit everyone. They have professional teachers which teach either in small groups of adults and children or one-to-one. They also provide English courses.

frontmatter.title: Academia Eurolink - Alhaurin el Grande
